alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Gordon; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cherokee, southeastern Gordon, western Pickens and northeastern Bartow Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was centered near Funkhouser, or 13 miles southeast of Calhoun, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Talking Rock, Fairmount, Salacoa Valley, Pine Log, Blaine, Talmadge, Funkhouser and Hinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.
